channel.title: Satellite on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio
channel.description: Recent content in Satellite on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio

item.title: Project Aiga: a portable VHF/UHF antenna optimised for satellite work
item.description: Today, we are glad to present you a very special antenna: Aiga. Aiga is a double band VHF/UHF antenna designed for portable use.

item.title: A QFH antenna for NOAA and Meteor M2 satellites reception
item.description: During my pursuit of the best antenna for receiving NOAA/Meteor images (I already built a Double-Cross antenna and a Turnstile), I decided to try a QFH antenna.
